hackathon-description-text: WHACK, the Wellesley College hackathon, will be held November 10-12, 2017.
hackathon-eligibility: College students who are at least 18 years old.
hackathon-rules:
We are sanctioned by and participate in Major League Hacking (MLH). You authorize us to share certain application/registration information for event administration, ranking, MLH administration, and occasional messages about hackathons in line with the 
Additionally, all participants must abide by the

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First to choose 1 item from the following: Snapchat Spectacles, a RC Quadcopter Drone, or a 1TB External Hard Drive.
Second to choose 1 item from the following: Snapchat Spectacles, a RC Quadcopter Drone, or a 1TB External Hard Drive.
Third to choose 1 item from the following: Snapchat Spectacles, a RC Quadcopter Drone, or a 1TB External Hard Drive.
Given to a hack with the best overall user experience and design.
Prize: T-Rex costume
All members of the team must be either a first year, a sophomore, or a first time hacker.
Awarded for a hack that brings surprise and delight.
One members of the team must be a resident of MA or go to a college/university in MA.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsored by MassCEC: Best Ecological Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Awarded to the hack most likely to continue post-hackathon.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Rough Draft Ventures: Most Entrepreneurial Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize: Pusheen stuffed animals and a single $100 donation to charity of choice
Hacks where the main focus is on hardware.
Prize: Audio-technica ATH-M20x Professional Monitor Headphones.
Prize: Google Daydream View - VR Headset
Prize: Steam Gift Card - $50 value
Prize: An obscene amount of mac & cheese
Prize: Giraffe onesie
Prize: Disney Moana Lego Kit
Be entered in a random lottery when you take a shower at the Keohane Sports Center!
Be one of the first 25 teams to submit to Devpost.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: First 25 Teams to Submit to Devpost

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Qualcomm DragonBoard 410c + power source
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $250 AWS credit
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Raspberry Pi and PiHut Essential Kit
Prize: Amazon Fire TVs and Game Controllers
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsored by Viacom: Best Multimedia Hack

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=106 Central St, Wellesley, MA 02481, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How interesting and innovative is the idea of this project?
